meanings.definition: The quality or state of being wonderful or marvelous.
meanings.sent1: The wondrousness of the sunset filled her with joy.
meanings.sent2: The wondrousness of nature never fails to amaze me.
meanings.sent3: The wondrousness of the talking dog made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with the wondrousness of a thousand stars.
meanings.sent5: The wondrousness of the waterfall was like a magical spell.

meanings.definition: Something that is wonderful or marvelous.
meanings.sent1: The children were amazed by the wondrousness of the circus.
meanings.sent2: She gazed in awe at the wondrousness of the ancient castle.
meanings.sent3: The wondrousness of the giant cake made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His voice carried the wondrousness of a heavenly choir.
meanings.sent5: The wondrousness of the rainbow painted the sky with magic.
